name: CentOS 6.6 Image, cloud-init enabled (64-bit)
description: CentOS version 6.6 cloud Image for OpenStack, KVM Hypervisor. The Image comes pre-configured with cloud-init packages.
default_password: No password. Please configure password using cloud-init

name: CentOS 7.1 Image, cloud-init enabled (64-bit)
description: CentOS version 7.1 cloud Image for OpenStack, KVM Hypervisor. The Image comes pre-configured with cloud-init packages.
default_password: No password. Please configure password using cloud-init

name: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Image, cloud-init enabled (64-bit)
description: Ubuntu version 12.04 LTS cloud Image for OpenStack, KVM Hypervisor. The Image comes pre-configured with cloud-init packages.
note: The version of cloud-init that works with Ubuntu 12.04 LTS does not support (a) new user creation, (b) file creation, and (c) ssh key injection through the cloud-config script.
